dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S1918 IS: Clarity for Military Retiree Health Care Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Shaheen introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a special change in status rule for employees who become eligible for TRICARE.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Clarity for Military Retiree Health Care Act .

section.header: Special change in status rule for employees who become eligible for TRICARE

subsection.text: Subsection (g) of section 125 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.header: Change in status relating to TRICARE eligibility
paragraph.text: For purposes of this section, if a cafeteria plan permits an employee to revoke an election during a period of coverage and to make a new election based on a change in status event, an event that causes the employee to become eligible for coverage under the TRICARE program shall be treated as a change in status event.

subsection.text: The amendment made by this section shall apply to events occurring after the date of the enactment of this Act.
